io.dropwizard.grpc.client

Class GrpcChannelFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.grpc.client.GrpcChannelFactory

  • public class GrpcChannelFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for building ManagedChannels in dropwizard applications.

    Configuration Parameters:

    Name Default Description
    hostname (none) Hostname of the gRPC server to connect to.
    port -1 Port of the gRPC server to connect to.
    shutdownPeriod 5 seconds How long to wait before giving up when the channel is shutdown.

      • builder

        public io.grpc.ManagedChannelBuilder builder()
        Returns:
        A ManagedChannelBuilder, with hostname and port set from the configuration and plaintext communication enabled. The builder can be customized further, e.g. to add channel-wide interceptors.

      • build

        public io.grpc.ManagedChannel build(io.dropwizard.setup.Environment environment)
        Parameters:
        environment - to use
        Returns:
        A ManagedChannel with hostname and port set from the configuration and plaintext communication enabled. The returned channel is lifecycle-managed in the given Environment.
